It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
The people of the Hermoti continent enjoy peace and prosperity, culture is developing, and technology is advancing.
At the same time, an evil force is quietly awakening.

The power of the Nihilo Lord will bring endless destruction and fear, and when the Nihilo Lord awakens, he will wreak havoc with his dark army, destroying villages, polluting forests, and turning rivers into black venom. The once quiet world will be plunged into unprecedented chaos.
With the help of his companions, he finally defeated the Void Lord and the world returned to peace.

The leafy area is known for its tall trees and lush forests, interwoven with tree houses and suspension Bridges, where residents live in the trees and are at one with nature. The fresh air, the birds and flowers make it an ideal place for meditation and relaxation.

In the heart of the Linxi district is a crystal clear stream with extensive meadows and flower gardens on both sides, ideal for picnics and walks. There is also an ecological education center dedicated to the dissemination of environmental knowledge and nature conservation.

The Tidal area has a spectacular coastline and varied tidal scenery. Its sandy beaches and beachfront walks attract countless visitors to enjoy the sun, sand and waves. The Tidal zone also houses the Marine Life Center, which displays a wealth of Marine life.

Haiyun District is famous for its pleasant sea breeze and leisurely pace of life. Fishermen go out to sea every morning and bring back fresh seafood in the evening. The seafood market and beachfront restaurants serving the freshest delicacies attract diners.

The Rock area is known for its huge stones and solid buildings, and its inhabitants are known for their tenacity and hard work. The architecture and carvings here show exquisite stonework skills and attract many tourists to visit.

The buildings in the thick soil area are mainly made of heavy stone and clay, giving a sense of firmness and security. There are rich cultural and historical sites here that show the long history and unique cultural traditions of Shicheng.

The Flame Area is known for its active volcanic activity and hot springs, where visitors can experience the comfort of geothermal hot springs and the thrill of volcanic exploration. The landscape is magnificent and perfect for adventure and adventure lovers.

The Red Light area is full of red rocks and veins, where miners work hard to mine all kinds of precious ores. The unique landscape and mining activities in this area make it a popular location for geologists and tourists.

The district's tall buildings gleam in the sunlight, with the headquarters of business giants and luxury shopping malls. At night, the brilliant area is brightly lit, like the stars, attracting countless tourists to come to sightseeing and shopping.

It is a haven for craftsmen and inventors, and the tinkling of various metals and the roar of flames fill the area. There are the most advanced forging workshop and machinery factory, the products are exported to the four corners.

The Shadow Zone is shrouded in eternal shadow, and the buildings here are mainly black and gray, giving a mysterious and solemn feeling. Its inhabitants are skilled in secret skills and strategies, and many legendary stories have originated here.

The Valley area is located in a deep valley and is shrouded in mist all year round. The environment here is quiet and mysterious, and the residents live a secluded life. The natural landscape here is unique, making it an ideal place for those seeking peace and inspiration.

The Hadal Zone is the deepest part of the Deep, full of unknowns and opportunities for exploration. There are many undiscovered caves and underground rivers, where explorers search for treasures and secrets, but also face numerous challenges and dangers.

Elemental Warriors
You must embark on a journey to find all the power to fight the Nothingness Lord, and the future of Hermoti depends on your decision.
Wait, there's something wrong here.
What's wrong? You're too sensitive, right? Come on, I still need to find Calvin, maybe after this mission, the wise old man will give me something interesting.
These are not beautiful people, they are very hostile, the person you are looking for is probably in danger.
All the more reason to find out what's going on.
All right.
If they're in danger, all the more reason for us to move quickly to find out what's going on. We can't risk them getting hurt.
Okay, you're right. We need to figure this out and make sure everything's safe.
Thank you for driving away the enemy, these people seem to be premeditated, originally I foresaw some bad things, was trying to find the wise, but these people besieged here.
Do you know who these people are? What they want.
I'm not sure, but they're supposed to have something to do with foreseeing dark forces. Let's go to the wise man first.
The problem seems to be getting more and more complicated.
Yes, the emergence of dark forces may mean a greater crisis, and we must be more careful. A wise man may be able to provide some crucial clues or guidance.
I agree. We need to be more careful every step of the way. May wise men help us understand the source and purpose of these dark forces.
Let's act quickly. The sooner we find the wise, the sooner we can solve the problem.
All right, let's go right away. I hope that this time the wise will give us some clear direction and help us solve these difficulties.
We're still too weak!
We did our best. It's more complicated than we thought. Those people are clearly putting up obstacles on purpose.
Yeah, I didn't expect them to be so hostile to us. Still, it's disappointing not to get the job done. The wise old man might not be happy.
This failure is a lesson. We need to reassess our strategy and perhaps be more cautious.
Everybody be careful. After what happened last time, the enemy must be on guard.
Trust me, all enemies are a piece of cake.
The wise man is right. The enemy's actions seem premeditated, and after we interrupted them last time, they'll be ready if they return this time.
I also think the wise man has a point.
All right, all right. Whatever you say.
What's your purpose? Why are you attacking here?
No talking, right? Well, then I'm gonna have to force you to talk. Here we go.
Well, it looks like we're having the same problem elsewhere. What are these assholes up to?
I guess we'll have to find out for ourselves what they're up to.
(The Wood element has been extracted, so let's not let them know!)
Looks like we're busy.

They attacked the Star and Moon Forest at the same time also made action on Water city, I think the situation is not too optimistic, other cities are estimated to be within their plan, we need to seize the time.

(Taking a deep breath, trying to organize the words) They not only attacked the Starmoon Forest this time, but also launched an attack on the Water City. The situation is not optimistic, and other cities are likely to be in their plans. We need to work against time to develop a strategy as soon as possible.

(Nodding, firm expression) Our aim now is not only to defend, but also to weaken the enemy as much as possible before they are fully deployed. Watertown is a strategic place. We must not let it fall into enemy hands.

(Thinking as he arranges his equipment) We need to allocate resources quickly and clearly. Arya, you and I will proceed to the Water City, immediately organize the defense and investigate the enemy's plans. Wise Old Man and Calvin, you stay here, secure Starmoon Forest, and gather as much information as you can about the enemy.

(Nodding in agreement, hesitating) Got it. We must ensure that all operations are under control and that the damage to the enemy is minimized before the enemy actually launches. At the same time, I will try to find clues about the wood element, in case of emergency.
Act quickly. We have no time to waste. Noah, Simon, you need to make sure this forest is safe. Calvin, your mission is also very important, and we all need each other's cooperation and support.
(Turning to Noah) Also, be careful of possible enemy ambushes and traps. They'll do everything they can to stop us, so stay alert.
(Deep breath) Yes, we are now facing not only the enemy's army, but also their tricks and plots. Everyone needs to keep the lines of communication open and report anything.
We're still too weak!

(Kneeling on the ground, holding a broken weapon in his hand, eyes full of frustration) We did not expect the enemy to be so strong in this battle. Our supposed line of defense was utterly incapable of resisting their attack. How did we underestimate the enemy's strength?

(Pain in eyes, firm tone) We did underestimate the strength of the enemy, but now is not the time to blame ourselves. We must recover as quickly as possible, reorganize our lines of defense, and minimize the damage caused by the enemy.

(Stepping aside to examine the situation on the battlefield, his face darkening) The enemy's attack was much fiercer than we had imagined. Their strategy is clearly very thorough, which may have something to do with the state of the wood element. Our defenses were not prepared enough, and the enemy took advantage of our vulnerabilities.

(slapping the ground angrily, his voice hoarse) This is a painful lesson. There are serious problems with our assessment of the enemy, and we must get to the root causes of this defeat. We can't let that happen again.

(Looking up, pale) Our troops also suffered heavy losses, and their morale was greatly damaged. It's not just about rebuilding our defenses, it's about reassuring people. Lost time and soldiers cannot easily be made up for, but we must pick ourselves up.

(Walks over to Simon and taps him on the shoulder) We have to revisit our previous strategy to find out where the holes are. The enemy has shown its strength and we can no longer be swayed by their machinations.

(Pause for reflection, tone steady) We need a detailed postwar analysis immediately. The enemy took advantage of the holes in our defense, especially after the Wood element was drawn, and our strength was greatly weakened. This is a huge problem, and we have to find a way to remedy it.

(Taking a deep breath, trying to control his emotions) The most important thing now is to recover and repair. We need to repair damaged facilities, reorganize forces, and ensure the flow of messages. It is necessary to avoid the appearance of information islands, lest the enemy take advantage of the void again.

(Nodding with determination in his eyes) We must make contact with the other cities as soon as possible, to make sure that they will not be attacked by the enemy. Watertown, in particular, may be in even more critical condition.
(Standing up, firmly) No matter how difficult we meet, we can't give up. We must stick together, learn from this defeat and improve our strategies and tactics.

(Turning to Noah, calm tone) We also need to reassess the enemy's strategy and plan of action, especially how they can exploit our weaknesses. The process may be difficult, but only by thoroughly understanding the enemy's intentions can we fight back effectively.

(Steady eyes, resolute determination in voice) We will come back from this defeat. Although the challenges we face this time are enormous, we will not shrink from them. Now is the time to regroup, and we must face the battle ahead with a stronger posture.
These guys are here. Leave it to me. Let me see what I do with them.
Do not be careless, I do not know whether these people have got the news to know what happened in the Star-moon Forest, if they already know, they will certainly strengthen their defenses.
Hey, where the hell are you guys from, and what do you have to do with those people in Starmoon Forest.
Oh, no, we got caught, hero. You stupid bastard, you can't keep quiet.
Looks like the Starmoon Forest operation has been discovered, and since you're here, we'll have to take care of you.
Well, that's a lot of talk. That's strength.
These guys are tough. I'm lucky I'm smart.
It's not over yet. We still need to go deeper into the Water city, and I don't think this is the number of enemies.
Arya's got a point. Judging from what happened in Starmoon Forest, this isn't the only enemy, so let's hurry.

(Eyes firm, quickly arranging equipment) We now have to find the enemy's real target and main force as soon as possible, the water city is likely to be in danger. We must go to Water City and stop the enemy's next move.
(Nodding firmly to Arya and Simon) Got it. We're not gonna let these guys win. Keep moving, make sure our operations are not disrupted, find the enemy's main force and defeat their plans.
(Quickly tidy up things on the battlefield, look around) We need to get out of here as soon as possible, the enemy may already know where we are. Stay alert and don't make any more mistakes.

(Glancing around to make sure no details are missed) We will adjust our tactics to the situation to ensure that we are in the best position to deal with the enemy in Watertown. This is a critical time, and every step must be taken with care.
(Rearmament, deep breath) Let's move quickly, no time to waste. Our goal is to protect Watertown while uncovering the enemy's true plans. Let's go!
We're still too weak!
(Glancing around, eyes dim) Yes, our plan has been thoroughly discovered by the enemy. They moved much faster than we expected. The defenses of Starmoon Forest have collapsed. We can't hold it.

(sitting down, looking down in thought) We thought we could solve the problem with courage and strength, but apparently the enemy had not only a powerful army, but also a better plan. Now we need to find out the root cause of the failure.

(Looking solemn, thumbing through battle notes) The enemy was clearly well prepared, and we underestimated their capabilities and tactics. Their attacks on the Starmoon Forest and the Water City show just how sophisticated their plans are. The reason for this failure lies not only in our tactics, but also in the lack of intelligence on the enemy.

(clenches his fists in anger) We are all so wrong! If we had discovered the enemy's true intentions earlier, the result might have been different. Now we have to find a way to make up for the loss and not let this defeat drag us down any longer.

Failure is painful, but we must learn from it. First, we need to re-examine the enemy's mode of action and identify their weaknesses. Then, quickly consolidate resources and prepare for the next battle.

(Standing up, firm expression) We also need to contact surviving cities and Allies as soon as possible to make sure they are aware of our situation and are ready for further defense. We can't give the enemy any more leverage.

(Nodding, looking serious) The situation of the wood element also needs to be resolved immediately. The enemy may know of its value and exploit it, and we must repair or regain the element of wood as soon as possible to increase our strength.
(Thinking for a moment, looking up) Next, we need to make a new plan to make sure we don't repeat this mistake. Every move must be carefully planned to avoid being exploited by the enemy.

(eyes firmly) We also need to strengthen internal communication and coordination to ensure that everyone can play a role in the battle ahead. Only time and fighting power can be lost, but we must remain united and continue to move forward.
We need to recover our losses and recalibrate our strategy as soon as possible. The enemy's strength is stronger than we think, and we need to adjust accordingly to face more serious challenges.

(Deep breath, calm tone) Although we have suffered a major setback this time, as long as we are fully prepared and learn from the lesson, we will surely turn the situation around. The key is to stay calm and gradually regain our advantage.

(looking firmly at everyone) We must not be defeated by this defeat, but must rise up and meet the challenges ahead. Let's re-organize our thinking, adjust our strategy, and work together to win the next action!
You were right. These guys are still around.
How did you get in here? We were supposed to have someone on guard. Ha ha ha, it seems that you have some ability to get in here, I think our teammates have been taken care of by you.
I guess you're not stupid. You want to tell me, or I want you to tell me.
Ha ha ha, I advise you to leave, I don't want to hurt you, we have something to get here.
If I'm not mistaken, you're trying to extract the power of the water.
Who are you, when there are not many people on the continent of Elmote who still understand the power of the elements?
These elemental powers are important to the continent of Hermote, and if they are used by evil people, the entire continent of Hermote could be destroyed, including you.

We don't like to destroy, we just need the power here to make the world a better place. Hermote has been quiet for thousands of years, and now people seem to take everything for granted, and people are not yet able to grasp the power of freedom, and freedom eroded by desire will destroy the world.
Noah: Cut the crap and let's have a fight.
Again, I don't want to hurt you, but if you get in the way of what we're doing, I will show you no mercy.
Then come on.
(smiles a little disapprovingly, then takes a combative stance) In that case, let's see who is the final winner. Are you up for the challenge?
l Simon: (glancing sideways at Noah, eyes full of determination) We must go all out, whatever the motives of the enemy, this place must be held. Everybody, get ready!

(clenches the weapon, looks solemn) Pay attention to protect yourself, the enemy may have more plots and means. We need to be fully prepared to make sure that this fight does not lead us into even greater difficulties.
(Deep breath, firmness in voice) Okay, let's go. No matter what difficulties we face, we will not flinch. Let's find out the truth in the fight and protect our home!
You cannot stop this from happening, and you have no idea what is about to happen.
It seems that this matter is more serious than we expected.

(Walks over to Noah, smiles) Well done, Noah. Although we faced serious challenges, your courage and determination allowed us to prevail. However, we cannot relax, and further checks and preparations are still needed.
(writhing in pain on the ground, resentful in tone) Do you really think that's going to stop us? You have only hindered part of our plan, and the real challenge has only just begun.

(looking coldly at Finn, firmly) Your plot has been discovered by us. Even if you have other plans, we will not let you succeed. We will continue to protect our homeland and ensure that your plots do not succeed.

(looking around in a calm voice) We must check the battlefield and the vicinity to make sure that no other enemy remains. Although we have won this battle, we must not let down our guard. There may be follow-up from the enemy.

(Nodding, quickly directing the team) Split up and make sure you don't miss any enemies or hidden dangers. Especially in the water City situation, we need to check on them immediately, make sure they're safe.
(Turning to Finn, with determination in his voice) Your plan has been completely destroyed. Now, you will face justice. We will turn you over to the authorities and make you pay for your crimes.
(clenched teeth, angry eyes) You'll be sorry. You think you have won the day, but the real test has just begun. We're gonna make you pay.

(Pause for reflection, firm tone) Although we have won this battle, we also need to draw lessons from the experience of this battle. The enemy is clearly very dangerous, and we must strengthen our preparedness to deal with possible future threats.

(Walks over to Noah, gentle tone) We may have won the battle, but we still have to move on. It is our common responsibility to protect our homeland, and we must remain vigilant and ready to meet new challenges.

(Takes a deep breath, looks serious) That's right. We will continue to stay united and strengthen our defenses to ensure the safety of our homeland. Let us use this victory as a new starting point and continue to work hard so that no threat can affect our future.
(Nodding with confidence) Now, we need to focus on the next task. Keep moving, make sure all the cities are protected, make sure we don't face a threat like this again.
(Smiling, firmly) This victory gives us confidence, but the real challenge is still ahead. Let us take this victory as motivation and continue to move forward, for our homes, for everyone!

(Smiling, hope twinkling in his eyes) Let us work together, and keep fighting, in order to protect all that we hold dear. The victory is only the beginning, the road ahead is still full of challenges, but we will be able to overcome all difficulties.
We're still too weak!

(Sighs deeply, eyes flashing with pain) We thought we could solve the problem with our strength and strategy, but the reality was so harsh. The enemy's plan was not only sophisticated, it was also highly effective.

(Sitting on the ground, looking depressed and speaking in a low voice) It's unfortunate. Our plan was a complete failure, and we lost many soldiers. The enemy seems to have grasped the pattern of our actions, leading to this fiasco.

(Standing at a distance, looking at them coldly, with a hint of mockery in his tone) Haha, it seems that your resistance is still too weak. Even if you try your best, it's in vain. The real challenges lie ahead.
(glares angrily at Fane, his voice tinged with hate) Your conspiracy has done us great harm. We may have failed, but we will not let your plan succeed. We'll find a way to fight back.

(Walks over to Noah, voice steady) Now is not the time to blame yourself. We must learn from this failure and review our strategy. The enemy is clearly stronger than we thought, and we need to reassess their capabilities and plans.

(Rising, deep breath, firm tone) We need to recover quickly and make sure that our fighting power is not further weakened. At the same time, it is also necessary to contact other surviving cities as soon as possible to ensure that they are aware of enemy movements and are ready for defense.
